name: Bumble Bee
description:
This unique, truly beautiful three dimensional piece of artwork is lovingly hand felted. The black and yellow bumble is made using a mix of carded and merino wool, with the gorgeous rose pink felt flower pieced together using raspberry carded wool. 

Bumble Bee comes double mounted in a bespoke white wooden box frame, beautifully tissue wrapped making it the perfect gift.

Frame Size 30.5 x 30.5cm

Their is also an unframed option, please see below. The picture will be sent wrapped in acid free tissue paper. Because my pictures are made from sheeps wool, in part they can be delicate and so to preserve the piece it is best to handle as little as possible.

Due to the bespoke nature. These pieces are constantly evolving and the pictures are for guideline purposes only as each piece is unique.

Each piece is handmade and framed to order and has a two week lead time.

International delivery available

Please see my FAQs for further info.

name: Sheeps
description:
'Sheeps' nestled behind a dry stone wall. A fabulous, unique three dimensional piece, all hand needle felted. Six different sheep with their individual personalities and expressions makes this artwork something really special and captures the imagination of many making it a real talking point.

'Sheeps' comes double mounted in a bespoke white wooden box frame

Frame Size 71 x 33.5 x 8.5cm deep

Their is also an unframed option, please see below. The picture will be sent wrapped in acid free tissue paper. Because my pictures are made from sheeps wool, in part they can be delicate and so to preserve the piece it is best to handle as little as possible.

Due to the bespoke nature. These pieces are constantly evolving and the pictures are for guideline purposes only as each piece is unique, but equally as beautiful.

Each piece is handmade and framed to order and has a two week lead time.

International delivery available

name: The Owl and the Pussycat
description:
The Owl and the Pussycat went to sea in a beautiful pea green boat...

This fabulous piece of three dimensional artwork inspired by the beautiful poem is lovingly hand felted to the highest standards. The owl has a mix of browns, greys, black and white with piercing yellow eyes in carded and merino wool, and the pussycat tan and orange and white with those aqua green eyes lovingly looking up at Owl. 

A perfect gift for a child's room, for you, for a loved one. A gorgeous picture, that will stay with you forever.
